jump_scares.spoiler: Pete opens his umbrella behind Miranda
Miranda sees a girl standing on the road
There is a sudden flashback to the girl on the bridge
An invisible presence breathes on the window in front of Miranda
The nurse’s hand reaches out to grab Miranda
There is a loud thump as Miranda walks down a corridor
Chloe’s face suddenly appears at the window of the cell door. [Video]
Miranda bends down to reveal Rachel standing behind her
Miranda turns around and screams as she sees Rachel’s face in front of her
An apparently unconscious Miranda suddenly jumps up and screams as a guard reaches down to check on her
While holding her breath underwater, Miranda opens her eyes and sees Rachel screaming at her. [Video]
Miranda sees Rachel in the rear view mirror
The car lights and stereo suddenly turn on
A policeman grabs Miranda on the shoulder
Hands grab at Miranda from underneath some steps
